sentences.en: Active & negative factor of indebted management, and keeping away of fundraising risk.
sentences.cn: 负债经营对企业的积极 和 消极作用, 以及筹资风险的防范.

sentences.en: an Action Pack full of fundraising ideas
sentences.cn: 讲了许多募捐方法的一本《行动宝盒》

sentences.en: As a fundraising leader, what are your primary responsibilities?
sentences.cn: 身为一位募款领导人责任 为何 ?

sentences.en: Coordinate effective fundraising methods for your district.
sentences.cn: 为您的地区协调有效的募款方法.

sentences.en: Description: Two Needs, Two Ways of Giving is TRF's comprehensive fundraising message.
sentences.cn: 说明: [两种需求, 两种捐献方式]是扶轮基金会全面性的募款讯息.

sentences.en: He did a terrific amount of fundraising.
sentences.cn: 他做了大量的筹款工作。

sentences.en: He said: " Terence was a fundraising idea that really took off. "
sentences.cn: 他说: “ 用特伦斯玩具熊筹款的想法真的启动了. ”

sentences.en: It's a continuous process and we often call it the fundraising cycle.
sentences.cn: 人际关系是个持续的过程,我们通常也称它为募捐周期.

sentences.en: Jan . Fundraising school concert tour for 1985 Colombia volcanic disaster.
sentences.cn: 为哥伦比亚火山灾难巡校筹款.

sentences.en: Mr Chow and his staff at a fundraising walk.
sentences.cn: 周家彦与同事参加慈善步行筹款.

sentences.en: Mr Obama's fundraising prowess gives him momentum.
sentences.cn: 奥巴马非凡的资金募集表现给了他力量.

sentences.en: Our school has recently kicked off a mass fundraising campaign.
sentences.cn: 我们学校最近发起一次大规模的筹款运动.

sentences.en: People take the fundraising in schools, offices and homes theon the day.
sentences.cn: 在这一天人们在学校, 办公室,家里来募集善款,用来帮助弱势团体.

sentences.en: Rotary's primary responsibilities include fundraising, advocacy, and volunteer recruitment.
sentences.cn: 扶轮主要的责任包括了募款 、 倡导和招募义工.

sentences.en: The firm's owners acquired the dress in 1997 at a fundraising auction.
sentences.cn: 该公司的所有人在1997年1场募款拍卖会上,获得这套礼服.

sentences.en: We are fundraising for AIDS research.
sentences.cn: 我们正在为艾滋病研究募捐.

trans.tran_en: the activity of collecting money for a specific purpose, especially in order to help people who are ill, old etc
